content.description: The complete photoelectron spectrum of a pure element is shown in the diagram above.
content.question: If peaks <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> represent <math alttext="s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>s</mi></math> sublevels, which of the following sublevels is represented by peak <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
